venue.name: Show Case Cinimas in North Haven

item.description:
Those who are going to the North Haven Barnes and Noble for Coffee and are coming to this Movie,
DO NOT RSVP HERE.
I will leave the B & N and Movie Meet Up for those that are more comfortable
With that arraignment of having coffee before the movie.

I am making a SEPARATE RSVP for those who CANNOT make it at 12:30 to the North Haven
Barnes and Noble for Coffee.

This RSVP will ONLY be for those who can meet us at 1:30 at Show Case Cini to see the Movie of
National Treasure: Book of Secrets.

Please buy your movie tickets and walk over to which ever door the movie will be playing at.
Please wait outside that door in front of the movie door for us to meet you there.
Then we can all go in as a group to watch the movie.

I am allowing for the option that some of us might go some where close by after the
Movie for Coffee.
We are not going back to Barnes and Noble.

I think that I saw a restaurant over by the Targets Shopping area that we can go to after the movie.

I will look around before going to Barnes and Noble to see if there is any place else for us
To go for coffee if we want after the movie.

I hope that creating a separate Meet Up for those who are Only going to the Movie
and who might join us for coffee also after the movie will make things easier for some
Members of the group.

Again, this RSVP is Only for those who are NOT going to Barnes and Noble before the Movie.

Please Change Your RSVP to which ever event best meets your schedule for
Sunday, January 6.

Because of the Meet Up Programming, since I am inputting this Meet Up,
I will automatically become a RSVP Yes. No one else going to Barnes and Noble
Has to change their RSVP to Yes.

Mike B
item.how_to_find_us: Wait for us out side of the Movie Room Doors of National Treasure: Book of Secrets for the 1:30 Screening.
item.why: Those who enjoy Action Films. Those who are Nick Cage Fans.
item.name: Those Who can ONLY go to the Movie National Treasure
